alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 9:40AM AKST until March 09 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Storm total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches are expected, heaviest north and east of Fairbanks. * WHERE...Middle Tanana Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery driving and walking surfaces. Travel could become difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue today, and will taper from Fairbanks west this afternoon, and will taper off east of Fairbanks this evening. Fairbanks had 2 inches of snow at 9AM Thursday, and can expect another 2 inches by the times snow ends this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
